name: Danger Crab
description:
Danger Crab v0.1

Released the game

Danger Crab v0.2

-Fixed

Fixed falling through floor bug

Fixed next level error

Fixed goomba sharks not turning around on platform contact

Fixed goomba sharks getting stuck on barnacles

-Added

Added Sea Urchins

Can now jump on statues

Now 11 worms to get

Added Level 2 WIP area

Added octopodes and starfish to level 2
